post.description:
This API is used to send mesages using a channel.
This API can send single as well as bulk messsages.
post.summary: This API is used to send mesages using a channel

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Provided by vivaconnect upon signup

parameters.name: Body
parameters.description: Accepts Array of json to send bulk message

200.description: Returns message ID

400.description: Returns invalid request error in error array

500.description: in case of some exceptional error

example.msg: Something went wrong. Please try again later.

get.description: Use this API to check template validation

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: user can obtain auth token by using login API

parameters.name: templateId
parameters.description: Id of Template

200.description: Returns info of a template

details: please provide valid template name with only aplha numeric character in lowercase and underscore
please provide a valid template type of enum values: Standard Message Template , Media Message Template
Template category not selected
Template language not selected
please provide a body for primary language
Both of the template language cannot be same
please provide a valid template header type of enum values: Video, Document, Location, Text, Image
please provide header text for header type text
please provide a body for secondry language
please provide second language header text for header type text
Variable in both language header text does not match
please provide second language footer type
Variable not allowed in footer
Variable not allowed in second language footer
Variable in both language body does not match
please provide button data of type json
please provide website button text
please provide website button text for second language
please provide phone button text
please provide phone button text for second language
please provide valid web URL
please provide valid phone number
please provide quick reply text
please provide quick reply text of type array
please provide atleast one quick reply text
quick reply buttons limit of 3 exeeded
quick reply button data invalid, please makle sure it is string with maximum length of 20
please provide quick reply text for second language
please provide second language quick reply text of type array
please provide the same amount of second language quick reply text as there in quick reply text
second language quick reply buttons limit of 3 exeeded
econd language quick reply button data invalid, please makle sure it is string with maximum length of 20
both language quick reply buttons are not equal

400.description: Returns invalid request error in error array

500.description: in case of some exceptional error

example.msg: Something went wrong. Please try again later.

To add optin do not pass optinId to update optin pass optin ID along with parameters to update

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: user can obtain auth token by using login API

200.description: Returns Status of segment info completion

400.description: Returns invalid request error in error array

500.description: in case of some exceptional error

example.msg: Something went wrong. Please try again later.

post.description:
API to update optin
To update optinSourceId pass optin source
ID along with parameters to update
following are the optin source list :
1. Captured via any form/check-box/t&c - 154e25f4-44cd-4a48-984d-dbdce569d2c1
2. When received by direct optin message on Whatsapp - 28614254-12c6-4f44-aa3c-20cf9e9589cb
3. Optin added using API - 7ccc5ca2-4a8e-4a97-9b49-c5e258bbf649
post.summary: Update optin satus and add optin source id

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: user can obtain auth token by using login API

post.description:
Authorize API to use API key and generate auth token to be used in other supported API's.
Token generated using this API have validity of 30 days.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description:
User needs to enter base64 encoded email and password,
Email & Password needs to be encoded in the following manner : 'email:password',
format for header value : "Bearer[SPACE]base64EncodedTextOfEmailAndPassword",
example for header value : "Bearer MTIxQGdtYWlsLmFiY2Q=".

200.description: Returns auth token if API key provided is correct

400.description: Returns invalid request error in error array

500.description: in case of some exceptional error

example.msg: Something went wrong. Please try again later.
